explanation: [0-0] In the shot, a left hand holds a long blue balloon with a cartoon smiley face drawn on it. The balloon is filled with small red balls. Below the balloon, there's an oval green plate. On the right side of the shot, there's a pair of open scissors. The tip of the scissors is pointing at the top of the long blue balloon.

[0-2] Next, a right hand holding pink scissors cuts the long blue balloon. The air inside the balloon is released, and some of the small red balls fall out of the cut opening and land on the green plate.

As the right hand cuts the top of the orange balloon with the scissors, the black liquid pours out, flowing onto the green plate and mixing with the red balls. Then, the left hand takes the cut orange balloon away from the green plate and out of the shot.
